text: Keri Lynn Russell (born March 23, 1976 in Fountain Valley, California) is an American actress. She has starred in many movies for both the cinema and television. She starred in the television series Felicity from 1998 to 2002. Russell won a Golden Globe for "Best Actress in a Drama Series" in 1999. Russell has been in a relationship with Matthew Rhys since 2014. They had their first child together in 2016. == Other websites == * Category:Actors from Orange County, California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:1976 births Category:Living people
title: Keri Russell
